APP_LIST Struct Reference

#include <dsmdefs.h>

Collaboration diagram for APP_LIST:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Structure to hold list of connected applications.

In 32bit enviroment Each application will connect to a seperate instance of DSM data but with this list it allows ONE applicaiton to connect several time, as long as it uses a different name with each connection.

Definition at line 154 of file dsmdefs.h.

 the number of connected apps
